alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:59AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN PINE...CENTRAL CARLTON...SOUTHWESTERN BAYFIELD AND DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 158 AM CST, heavy snow showers were along a line extending from Poplar, to near Pattison State Park, to near Foxboro, to near Mahtowa, to near Cromwell, and moving southeast at 35 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less, wind gusts up to 35 mph, and rapid snow accumulation on roads are expected with these heavy snow showers. These heavy snow showers will be near... Hawthorne, Lake Nebagamon, Maple, Mahtowa, Poplar, Holyoke, Foxboro, and Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area around 205 AM CST. Solon Springs around 215 AM CST. Nemadji around 220 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these heavy snow showers include Wentworth, Belden, Pleasant Valley, Duquette, Middle Eau Claire Lake, Moose Junction, Amnicon Lake, Sawyer, Chaffey, and Bennett. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down, allow extra following and stopping distance between you and the vehicle in front of you, and allow extra time to reach your destination.
